author: lundblad
msg: * TRANSLATING: Document what was added in r11763.

author: lundblad
msg: Got tired of updating all translations each time I run locale-gnu-po-update.
* Makefile.in (locale-gnu-po-update): Allow specifying a single language to
update with the PO environment variable.

author: sussman
msg: Make the user_t into a more generic "access" context.  Allow this
access_context to hold all temporary user data, such as the
authenticated username and lock-tokens.  When an fs function requires
either form of authentication, it can surreptiously pull stuff out of
